Author: fintechnology30
Title: [ANN] FTCOIN ICO - Investment and Trading of tomorrow

It ensures stable investment income by distributed and automatized trading, based on leading trading systems and optimal portfolio of digital and fiat currencies, shares and other trading instruments. We have developed the unique trading system which allows the investors have the stable income on various trading markets with various trading instruments. We are providing the investment solutions, trading and business software development, teaching and consulting. What We Offer Initial FTT token Offering Price of 1 token – 10$ (in ETH) Total amount of tokens – 5 000 000 Bonuses PreSale – +10% of bonus tokens 1st day – +5% of bonus tokens 2nd-7th days – +4% of bonus tokens 2nd week – +3% of bonus tokens 3rd week – +2% of bonus tokens 4th week – +1% of bonus tokens 5th week – 0% of bonus tokens What We Will Do ICO funds will be invested in: 90% of funds will be invested in active business processes for immediately fulfillment of the obligations to ensure declared yield of not less than 10.5% in USD for the whole 100% of tokens FTT bought by investors 10% of funds will be invested in: Developing business object component architecture, technical and technological solutions of the ecosystem Developing a decentralized trading system solutions based on Trading System of Kasparov P.G. Author: fintechnology 22
Title: [ANN] FTCOIN ICO - Investment and Trading of tomorrow
Body: Analysts who advice not to invest in crypto-currencies are right in many ways. Nowadays crypto-currencies give high income, but the end is not far away. Good income will change to good falling.  If to enter the trend with investment today and even later everyone can lose everything at all. Tokens FTT in Project FTCoin are not crypto-currency. It is a digital warrantee to get stable investment income to your crypto capitals right now with minimal seed money. It is risk diversification.

Author: fintechnology 22
Title: [ANN] FTCOIN ICO - Investment and Trading of tomorrow
Body: I see on Internet many offers which are devoted to learning trading on the crypto currency. It seems fantastic due to such a huge volatility. But these courses have apprentices. I feel sorry for them because they won’t get nothing besides guaranteed loss of their money. Experts on ICO are seemed very originally – they are like “wedding generas”l, who assess the possibility of “tokenization” of any essence and processes , which show the credibility of the subject of ICO. Many teachers on investment in crypto-currency and fiat money have been appeared as well. It also seems fantastic. Everything is very simple - paraphrasing the well-known expression – “show me your PAMM account and I will tell you who are you”. But nobody shows their account because there is nothing to show. In our ICO we are always ready to show our PAMM accounts and statistics of The Alfa Forex broker. I suppose that statistics will be rather interesting for thoughtful investors, especially that we can give any explanations to it at our webinars. We organize these webinars at the topics which are of the greatest interest for investors. We are reall today but not in future.  Pavel Kasparov

Author: fintechnology 22
Title: [ANN] FTCOIN ICO - Investment and Trading of tomorrow
Body: Digital ecosystem of investment and trading FTCoin implies diversification option of investment portfolio through buying of tokens FTT. This option protects the investor against possible adverse effects of crypto exchange rate fluctuations. Tokens FTT initially are not crypto-currency. While investing in our ICO being the derivative of crypto-currency Ethereum tokens FTT are formed based to current exchange rate of ETHUSD and are dollar equivalent of crypto-currency investment. This gives the owner of tokens FTT the right to annual yield of not less than 12% in USD.  Vadim Bobenko, ICO Project Manager
